author: slomeo
body:
Fixed all the "hidden" overlaps inside the CSC subsystem (needed for Scenario 2021).

The "hidden" overlaps are not seen by cmsShow but only by 
SimG4Core/PrintGeomInfo/test/python/g4OverlapCheck_cfg.py script.

The new code has been checked by @ptcox
title: Fixed all the "hidden" overlaps inside the CSC subsystem
